privacy.title: Privacy Policy for Blizbi
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Blizbi collects, processes, and protects your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are committed to maintaining a high standard of data protection and transparency in all aspects of our service.

data_controller.title: 1. Data Controller
data_controller.contact_person: Contact Person: Helene Birkeland â€“ CEO

data_collection.title: 2. What personal data do we collect?
data_collection.intro: When you use Blizbi, we may collect the following types of personal data:
data_collection.identification: Identification and contact information: name, email address
data_collection.location: Location data: based on IP address or device location (with consent)
data_collection.usage: Usage data and preferences: search history, clicks, favorites
data_collection.technical: Technical data: IP address, device type, operating system, browser type
data_collection.settings: User settings and choices: language preferences, consents

data_processing.title: 3. Why do we process your data?
data_processing.intro: We process your data for the following purposes:
data_processing.personalization: To provide a personalized and relevant user experience
data_processing.improvement: To improve and develop our platform based on usage patterns
data_processing.insights: To generate anonymized insights for research and public development
data_processing.stakeholders: To support public and non-commercial stakeholders (e.g. municipalities and destination companies) in designing better local services
data_processing.no_advertising: We do not use your data for targeted advertising, and we never sell your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.

legal_basis.title: 4. Legal basis for processing
legal_basis.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
legal_basis.consent: Consent: You give us explicit consent when you sign up and use the platform
legal_basis.legitimate_interest: Legitimate interest: To ensure the secure and efficient operation of the service
legal_basis.legal_obligation: Legal obligation: When we are required to store or disclose information under applicable law

data_sharing.title: 5. Sharing of data
data_sharing.intro: Blizbi may share anonymized and aggregated insights with:
data_sharing.authorities: Public authorities, municipalities, and destination organizations
data_sharing.providers_intro: Blizbi also provides visibility to providers who have paid for featured placement within the app's discovery section. This visibility is offered without sharing any personal user data with those providers. User data remains internal and is only used to improve the platform experience.
data_sharing.dashboard_info: Providers may access a dedicated insight dashboard with anonymized traffic data, such as views and user interactions related to their listings. These statistics cannot be linked to individual users and are solely intended to help providers improve their offerings.

data_retention.title: 6. Data retention and deletion
data_retention.description: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, or until you request deletion. All data subject requests (access, correction, deletion) will be handled within a reasonable timeframe, and no later than one month.

user_rights.title: 7. Your rights
user_rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
user_rights.access: Access the data we hold about you
user_rights.correction: Request correction or deletion of your data
user_rights.restriction: Restrict the processing of your data
user_rights.withdraw: Withdraw your consent at any time
user_rights.complaint: File a complaint with the Norwegian Data Protection Authority (www.datatilsynet.no) if you believe your data is being processed unlawfully
user_rights.access_note: You may withdraw your consent or access your data settings at any time via the app or by contacting us directly.

policy_changes.title: 8. Changes to this Privacy Policy
policy_changes.description: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy when necessary. You will be notified of any significant changes via the app or by email. The latest version will always be available at
